price: Mo na mosiane firi mununkum no mu ba, anaasε Yεn na Yɛsiane ba?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
